content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at (x=1-3, y=1)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) containing iron plates

### Additional Storage at (x=5.5, y=3.5)
- Wooden chest with burner inserter at (5.5,2.5)

### Copper Plate Production at (x=2-4, y=7)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5) containing copper plates

### Power Generation System at (x=-5.5 to 16, y=26.5-35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5) providing water
- Boiler at (7,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Two pipe groups:
  - Water pipes connecting offshore pump to boiler (fluid system 2115)
  - Steam pipes from boiler to engine (fluid system 2118)
- Electricity network with multiple poles

### Research Setup
- Two labs connected to electricity network (id 4321)

### Copper Cable Production (In Progress)
- Assembling machine at (14.5,14.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Power Connection Issues
- Ensure you have the required items (like electric poles) in inventory before attempting to make power connections
- When placing power-dependent structures, make sure they are properly connected to a functioning power network

### Power Generation Problems
- The boiler needs fuel to operate - ensure coal or other fuel is loaded
- Steam engine is not receiving steam due to disconnected or empty fluid connections
- Verify the complete power chain: Water → Boiler (with fuel) → Steam → Steam Engine → Electric Network

### Entity Placement
- When setting up automated production, ensure all required components (power, inputs, outputs) are properly planned and available before placing machines
